sn35.107:1.1: “Mendicants, I will teach you the origin and ending of the world.
sn35.107:1.3: And what, mendicants, is the origin of the world?
sn35.107:1.4: Eye consciousness arises dependent on the eye and sights. The meeting of the three is contact.
sn35.107:1.5: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn35.107:1.6: Feeling is a condition for craving.
sn35.107:1.7: Craving is a condition for grasping.
sn35.107:1.8: Grasping is a condition for continued existence.
sn35.107:1.9: Continued existence is a condition for rebirth.
sn35.107:1.10: Rebirth is a condition for old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress to come to be.
sn35.107:1.11: This is the origin of the world. …
sn35.107:1.13: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the mind and thoughts. The meeting of the three is contact.
sn35.107:1.14: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn35.107:1.15: Feeling is a condition for craving.
sn35.107:1.16: Craving is a condition for grasping.
sn35.107:1.17: Grasping is a condition for continued existence.
sn35.107:1.18: Continued existence is a condition for rebirth.
sn35.107:1.19: Rebirth is a condition for old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress to come to be.
sn35.107:1.20: This is the origin of the world.
sn35.107:2.1: And what is the ending of the world?
sn35.107:2.2: Eye consciousness arises dependent on the eye and sights. The meeting of the three is contact.
sn35.107:2.3: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn35.107:2.4: Feeling is a condition for craving.
sn35.107:2.5: When that craving fades away and ceases with nothing left over, grasping ceases.
sn35.107:2.6: When grasping ceases, continued existence ceases.
sn35.107:2.7: When continued existence ceases, rebirth ceases.
sn35.107:2.8: When rebirth ceases, old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress cease.
sn35.107:2.9: That is how this entire mass of suffering ceases.
sn35.107:2.10: This is the ending of the world. …
sn35.107:2.12: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the mind and thoughts. The meeting of the three is contact.
sn35.107:2.13: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn35.107:2.14: Feeling is a condition for craving.
sn35.107:2.15: When that craving fades away and ceases with nothing left over, grasping ceases.
sn35.107:2.17: That is how this entire mass of suffering ceases.
sn35.107:2.18: This is the ending of the world.”
